comprehensive_overview: HISAT2 is a fast and sensitive alignment program for mapping next-generation sequencing reads (both DNA and RNA) against the general human population (as well as against a single reference genome). It builds on HISAT and Bowtie, allowing for significantly improved performance and new capabilities.
core_features: Fast and sensitive alignment of NGS reads
Mapping of DNA and RNA reads
Alignment against general human population or a single reference genome
Improved performance and new capabilities compared to HISAT and Bowtie
